title: New: Daniel Wilson – Give You Away
body:
Following on from the success of his 2014 EP, Boy Who Cried Thunder, one of the best voices in modern pop music, **Daniel Wilson**, has returned with another four track offering in the form of Sinner of the Week.

Again showcasing his unique ability to stumble upon a killer hook, EP highlights Give You Away and the title track suggest that he’s truly beginning to hit his stride, and that should an album materialise in the near future, it’s likely to be rather special. Check out a couple of EP cuts below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
